attributes.action: Call for all msps in the Scottish government to publish their full tax returns.
attributes.additional_details:
It is evident from various scandal reports that many people feel their choice of msp is confused by mistrust.

Modern politics must be accountable to the electorate.
attributes.background:
We call for the MSP's in the Scottish government to release their personal tax returns, investments and property holdings in this country and abroad for full public scrutiny.

MSP's should lead by example and this will enable the public to see what examples are being set.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
